spatial.RCC
Class RCCConstraintSolver

java.lang.Object
  framework.ConstraintSolver
      spatial.RCC.RCCConstraintSolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RCCConstraintSolver
extends ConstraintSolver

This ConstraintSolver implements a path consistency algorithm, to check the consistency of constraint network based of on RCC (Region Connection calculi) constraints

Author:
Iran Mansouri
See Also:
Serialized Form

protected ConstraintNetwork createConstraintNetwork()
Description copied from class: ConstraintSolver
Method to create a ConstraintNetwork for this ConstraintSolver. This method must be implemented by the developer of the specific ConstraintSolver implementation. It is called by the default constructor upon class instantiation.
